About

About

Luka is Professional Retoucher since 2011. Always ready to explore new options and possibilities with new projects. Worked with major names in industry. being published in Vogue, Elle, Harper’s Bazaar, L’officiel, Esquire, and others. Beside Retouching, works as Digital/Visual Artist, and recently started as Photographer.
